definition: make more complex, intricate, or richer
details:
verb
- make more complex, intricate, or richer
= example: make more complex, intricate, or richer
= synonyms: elaborate
- make more precise or increase the discriminatory powers of
= example: make more precise or increase the discriminatory powers of
- attenuate or reduce in vigor, strength, or validity by polishing or purifying
= example: attenuate or reduce in vigor, strength, or validity by polishing or purifying
- improve or perfect by pruning or polishing
= example: improve or perfect by pruning or polishing
= synonyms: down
- reduce to a fine, unmixed, or pure state
= synonyms: rectify
- treat or prepare so as to put in a usable condition
= example: treat or prepare so as to put in a usable condition
